title: How Many Calories in a Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?

h1: How Many Calories in a Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell menu item with grilled chicken, three-cheese blend, and flour tortilla; no customizations or sides.

quick_answer.text: A Taco Bell chicken quesadilla contains 510 calories with 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Taco Bell's info.

tweaks.label: Fresco style (swap cheese sauce for pico de gallo)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
What's the protein in a chicken quesadilla from Taco Bell?
How much sodium is in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: 1210 mg, so watch your intake if sodium-sensitive.

faqs.q: Are there lower-calorie options for Taco Bell quesadilla?
faqs.a: Try Fresco style to reduce by ~80 kcal by swapping creamy sauce for tomatoes.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a chicken quesadilla from Taco Bell?
faqs.a: 40 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber.
